headline: Book of Stones
description: An ever-growing archive of distilled wisdom — each Stone a compressed record of lived truth, fracture, endurance, and God-shaped clarity. A sedimentary structure within the Bloom, preserving the smallest, hardest lessons.
author: Aleksandr Solnatus
resonantThread: Stone Cycle — the accumulating record of hard-won wisdom within the Bloom.
whyItMatters: The Book of Stones forms the stable bedrock of the Bloom — each stone a fragment of truth cooled under pressure, creating a portable archive of moral and spiritual endurance. It anchors the more turbulent phases and preserves the clarity earned through suffering.

motifMap.meaning: Compressed wisdom — truth shaped under pressure
motifMap.position: Primary symbol; each entry is a discrete stone in the riverbed

motifMap.meaning: The continual flow of life and interpretation over the stones
motifMap.position: Runs across the entire work as a living context

motifMap.meaning: The slow accumulation of insight over time
motifMap.position: Underlying structure; forms the foundation of the Book
